snippet: The merger, which will create a 3,800-lawyer behemoth with 55 offices around the world, comes amid a spate of deals involving big law firms.
abstract: The merger, which will create a 3,800-lawyer behemoth with 55 offices around the world, comes amid a spate of deals involving big law firms.

headline.main: Fulbright and Norton Rose to Combine in Latest Law Firm Mega Merger
